Entries.DialogueText: Oh, is it my birthday? That's right... I almost forgot. Thanks.
Oh, is it my birthday? I was hoping I'd forget.
This is actually really nice, though. Thank you.
Oh, you made it? *squish*... Um... *smack*... I think I'll stick to frozen pizza. But thanks.
Heh... thanks. Tastes just like beer.
*gulp* Oh... Yeah, okay... I guess I should've seen this coming.
I'll... uh... guess I'll see you at the Saloon.
I... wasn't really expecting this, after all I've put you through...
I think I might be the luckiest guy in the world...
...Leave me alone.
has a glazed look in his eye. He won't speak to you.
...Yeah, me too.
I know... that's why I stopped by, to tell you about it.
Wow, it was that serious, huh? I can hardly remember...
I didn't know you were such a miser...
Okay, Dad...
Okay, Mom...
Oh, wow...
Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask Elliott for advice next time I see him at the saloon.
Sounds great. I'll have to create a bunch of practical effects to make it look cool.
Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.
Me? I get bored with Pelican Town sometimes.
But... I like that you're different. We balance each other out.
Oh really? I'm surprised... Didn't you move to Stardew Valley to escape the noise of the city?
I mean... Don't get me wrong, I totally understand. My life in Pelican Town is pretty bland, you know.
Sorry you had to see me like that, ...
I'm trying to cut back on the drinks... it's not going to be easy.
Have you tried the new Joja Bubblerito? I ate two in one sitting yesterday, that was a mistake...
Um... sure.
I'd better stop eating...
Dance? Hoo-boy. Okay... let me chug a few more of these first...
Don't you have work to do?
My body hurts a lot less since I cut back on the booze.
But it still feels like I'm always teetering on the edge...
Joja#What's the point of life if all you do is work?|I haven't been able to pay my rent, but Marnie's letting me stay anyway. I'm lucky.
I'll definitely be going to the saloon tonight. What else is there to do?
Buh... Can you imagine how disgusting my liver must look?
My body feels twenty years older than it should...
I don't have to go into work today, so I'm not complaining...
Oh, there's some kind of weird weather today? I didn't notice.
hard at work. He doesn't seem interested in talking.
I don't know you. Why are you talking to me?
Do you ever feel like the whole world is scrutinizing you like some disgusting insect?
I hardly know you. Why are you talking to me?||What's the point of talking to me? I don't want any friends.
Hey. Sorry if I came off as rude when we first met.
It takes me a while to warm up to strangers.||It's a lot of effort to be friends with someone. It's easier to just be alone.
I'll be honest, I still can't understand why you'd want to be friends with me.||Life isn't fair, and I can't help but feel bitter about it.
I heard you built Pam a house... That's really generous...
You know, I could use a hundred thousand gold myself...
*ahem* ...ah ...Just kidding. ...Heh.
I heard someone bought Pam a house... *sigh*... What did Pam ever do to earn that kind of generosity??
Okay, this sand is piping hot. I regret not wearing shoes.
Phew... feels good to have a cold drink...
Or maybe a few...
Hoo... Feels good to rest these hams.
If anyone needs me, I'll just be sitting here, marinating.
Buh... hope the bar's open.
Welp... got my year's supply of Vitamin D. Now I can play video games with the blinds shut the rest of the year.
That's right... I'm not wearing any shoes or socks.
Some call it a public health risk.
The crabs seem to enjoy it, though.
Why are you bothering me? I want to be alone.
Your farm seems like a great place to raise chickens.
I'm surprised that you're still trying to make friends with me. Haven't I been rude enough to you yet?
*sigh*...
Joja#I'm renting my room from Marnie at a really good price. It's small but I can't complain.|If I could reset my life maybe I'd start a chicken farm. Only free-range eggs of course.
I've really grown attached to Marnie's chickens.||A chicken will never let you down. Humans, on the other hand...
I don't understand you... *sigh*...
I'm busy, can't you tell?||...I don't feel like talking to anyone.
Hi, . I've actually been having a pretty good day so far.
You again? How many times do I have to tell you to leave me alone?
Hmm... it's . Should I throw a frozen pizza in the microwave, or should I wait?||If the Tunnelers win, I'll knock back a cold one to celebrate.
If they lose? I'll have a cold one to drown my sorrows.
...I think I might be gaining weight.
If I watch more TV maybe I can forget about life. That would be relaxing.
What do you want? Leave me alone.
You're really persistent. I guess I'm just surprised that anyone would be interested in talking to me.
Buh... Where's the Joja Cola?||Why try? Life's just a roll of the dice.
When they rolled mine, the dice fell off the table.
You like talking to me? I guess I believe you... maybe you're as weird as I am.
What? What do you want? Go away.
I need to keep it together for Jas' sake. I don't want to be a bad role model for her.||I'm kind of like a father figure to Jas. I just hope I haven't let her down too much.
What do you want from me? Money? I'd give you a pot of gold to leave me alone!
Every time I try something new it goes horribly wrong. You learn to just stay in a shell.
Life isn't so bad... at least I have frozen pizza and eggs.
We should go to a Tunnelers game some time. When I go by myself, I usually drink way too much beer.
No, I don't have time to chat with you.
Joja#*sigh* ...Every day is the same. Stocking those horrible shelves, going to the saloon, tossing and turning all night.|I hated my job at JojaMart, but now that I'm unemployed I feel even worse.
I guess I've grown attached to Marnie and Jas. We're a ragtag bunch but it kind of feels like a weird family.
I never really had much of a family as a kid.
Part of me is wondering if this isn't all some elaborate prank.
I can't believe you'd actually want to marry someone like me.
... My head's spinning, and I haven't even had a beer today.
That should do it...
It's the perfect home for you hens...
We'll have the best eggs in the whole valley!
Fresh and healthy, with rich golden yolks. Not like those pale, sickly Joja eggs...
...You know, Charlie... I was thinking...
A guy like me is always teetering on the edge of despair... know what I mean?
...But you and the other hens are going to keep me upright from now on... I know it.
What's wrong... too much pressure? *chuckle*
Hey, ... so, what do you think?
My special blue hens... I've been raising them in secret for the last few months.
I... Well, I won't be living here forever, and I wanted to pass something on to Jas. I've been teaching her how to care for them.
...I want to feel like I'm not just a leech on the world. I want to contribute somehow, even in a small way like this.
buhhh...
You wouldn't understand...
Hopefully I won't be around long enough to need a 'plan'...
Whaa..?!
Plan?
Jas...
I'm sorry...
You're right... I haven't felt this light since I was a kid.
No, actually. I've been drinking sparkling water instead of beer... and I feel great!
You know, I sometimes forget that I really do have friends, people that care about me.
And it's okay for me to rely on them... it doesn't make me weak.
Hi Jas. I've got something for you.
I've cut back on an expensive habit. I have a lot more spending money now!
Good one...
Hey, there you are!
I'm glad you decided to come. We should get going...
We're almost there...
Well... that was definitely a good game.
Oh, yeah... and we won, too.
Well... see you soon.
*gulp* ...pre-game nerves...
Here, I got you another cold one...
Hey, I've been meaning to say...
Thanks for sticking with me through everything... my anxiety, depression... you know...
You've been a really good friend to me.
Anyway... it's your first gridball game, huh?
-1 null -1 10 event_stadium1 -1 10 event_stadium2#Fun... Pelican Town seems really boring in comparison.
Gahh!! Look, the Tunnelers are on the attack!
Um... Sorry... I got carried away there.
Maybe I had one too many...
Goal!!
Hey...
Oh man... Uh... How do I say this?
I'm really sorry about what happened at the cliffs. That was... embarrassing...
-1 null -1 10 event_apologize1 -1 -10 event_apologize2 -1 10 event_apologize3#I'm just happy you're still here.
I've decided I want to see a therapist. Harvey got me in touch with a colleague of his...
Anyway... I just wanted to thank you for taking care of me. And I want you to know that I'm going to take things a little more seriously from now on.
I don't want to be a burden on anyone...
Hey, !
Uh... So I got two tickets to the Tunnelers game tonight.
If you want to come, meet me at the bus stop around 5pm.
I... I'm sorry...*hic*
M... My life...
It's a pathetic joke...
Look at me...
Why do I even try? ...*sob*
I'm too small and stupid to... to take control of my life...
I'm just a p... piece of soiled garbage flittering in the wind... *bluurp*
I've been coming here often lately... looking down...
Here's a chance to finally take control of my life... These cliffs...
B... bu... *blaap*... but I'm too scared, too anxious. Just like always...
... All I do is work, sleep, and drink ...t... to dull the feelings of self-hatred.
Why should I even go on? Tell me... T... Tell me why I shouldn't roll off this cliff right now...
...I think you should take me to the hospital now.
Jas needs you. You're like a father to her.The decision is your own. Just know that I'm here for you.
Up late, huh?
Here, have a cold one.
Buh... Life.
You ever feel like... no matter what you do, you're gonna fail?
...Like you're stuck in some miserable abyss and you're so deep you can't even see the light of day?
I just feel like no matter how hard I try... I'm not strong enough to climb out of that hole.
Heh... fast drinker, huh? Man after my own heart.
Heh... fast drinker, huh? Woman after my own heart.
Just don't make it a habit... you got a future ahead of you still.
Welp.. My liver's beggin' me to stop. Better call it a night.
See you around, .
Okay

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099
Entries.DialogueText: The last shred of hope I had left is completely destroyed... Thanks, . Are you happy now?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_1
Entries.DialogueText: Nice try, but that's not going to cut it...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Stop!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/i 446/k 195013
Entries.DialogueText: It's easy, you just gotta put some mustard on the cue ball...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/i 446/k 195013_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hey

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/i 446/k 195013_alt_1
Entries.DialogueText: You played a round of pool with the boys.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/i 446/k 195013_alt_2
Entries.DialogueText: Sebastian won, of course... but it was still a lot of fun!
Same
Hey!
It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition.
5,000g well spent!
Thanks again for the money, . It was a fun project for me, and all the guys seem happy with it!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun
Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, Emily!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun_1
Entries.DialogueText: So... How's your shift coming along?
I doubt it...
Pierre pressured me! He wanted to sell more bouquets!#(Start crying)
I'm your husband... you should trust me. I've always been honest with you about my problems.
Look... I know I haven't been able to quit cold turkey... but, I'm trying my best... and I'm getting a lot healthier.
My life is better now than it's ever been. I'm not in such a dark place anymore...
You know, when I'm playing this game, I become so focused that I can't think about anything else. It really helps when I've got 'the urge'...
Anyway... I'll just... eh... play ONE more round and head home. Okay?
You guys must have been really confused when you came in and saw me in front of the arcade machine!
Phew... that was fun.
Haven't had a session like that in a while... *urp*
Welp... I'm all sweaty. Better head back home.
Oh! Hey . I was just on my way home...
'Were you drinking?'... No!
Why would you think that?
*urp*
Huh?
Hmph..
Okay... I'm ready for another round!
Oh, hey! Didn't know I had an audience.
Yeah! What did you think?
I'm completely addicted to this game...
I can't help but play round after round...
I've even reached the number three spot in the global leaderboards... you might say I'm one of the best.
Oh, that's just Joja Cola... Yeah, yeah, I know... It's bad for the teeth. But it helps me focus...
Wait... did you guys think I was drinking beer?
? I told you I hadn't been drinking...
...That's alright, . You're just looking out for me. I get it.
Look... I know I haven't been perfect... but, I'm trying my best... and I'm gonna keep trying. So you don't have to worry about me.
Arrgh!
So close...
I'm sorry, I should've believed you
Okay guys, do you remember your lines?
Ready? Action!
Cut!
Oh, hey.
Check out my new camera...
Joja Co. is having a video advertisement competition. The prize is 10,000g.
Hey! I want you to be in this shot... okay?
Just walk by Clint and Emily in the background while they're talking... It'll give the scene a little more authenticity.
Okay... Ready?
Action!
That was perfect.
Thanks for the help.
If I hadn't met you, ... I might not even be here right now.
Which would be a shame, because the bird-watching up here is phenomenal!"/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Shane "Heh... I... I tend to joke a lot, because...well...

I guess keeping things light-hearted makes it so I don't have to open up and make myself vulnerable."/emote Shane 28/speak Shane "But every season that goes by, with you, I get a little more comfortable with myself.
Uh.. I guess what I want to say is...
I have no regrets marrying you!"
All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.
I might ask you to watch the animals soon so I can grab some food.
The animals have been given their favorite foods, so they're happy.Feel free to pet them, they won't bite.
Why is there no more pumpkin ale?
I talked Marnie into letting me take Jas into the maze. I think she's old enough.We're going very slow, though. Go ahead without us!
You gotta stay close to me, Jas. Don't run off!
Our hens have been working overtime to prepare for this festival.They deserve the best tonight... bowls full of sweet yellow corn!
Some of these eggs were laid just this morning. See? They're still warm!
Mmm... excellent sauce. *slurp*Ah, this green stuff is spicy! *munch**crunch* ...ow.
*burp* I might've eaten too much to dance... sorry.
I couldn't find any clean shirts so this one has to do.
Wow... you don't get hot pepper chutney like this in the big city...
Mmm... that roast smells good.
I'll never turn down free food.
The jellies were here a year ago, and they'll be back again a year from now... nature is amazing.
Are you all prepared for the fall? I am...Huh? Oh, I bought a king size bag of pumpkin chips. You can have one, if you want.
I wonder how many will show up this year?
I've met some people who believe in spirits, and magic... but me? I've never seen anything that couldn't be explained by science.
What am I thankful for?....uh...I'm thankful... that you pulled me out of the gutter. And showed me that life is worth living.
One benefit of the cold weather is that I can put frozen pizzas under the tree.Someone's in for a real treat...
If it was up to me, I'd probably have a pizza festival at the saloon, instead...
Remember when we sat at the old pond and shared a beer? That was around here somewhere.Well, it's best not to dwell in the past... even the good memories bring me pain.
Winter can be really hard on animals. Did you install heaters in your coops and barns?
Oh wow, ! How'd you know this is my favorite?
This is great! Thanks!
I don't really like this.
Why are you giving me your garbage?
Oh, you got me something? Thanks!
